title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 1, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of the astronomer Maria Mitchell (1818), who made the first American comet sighting and who was the first female faculty member of Vassar College.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of the astronomer Maria Mitchell (1818), who made the first American comet sighting and who was the first female faculty member of Vassar College.
